data.text: @Wil_Anderson Had a little tear up myself. So sad.
@Wil_Anderson 😔
@Wil_Anderson Was about to tweet about the joy of sharing @Billy_Connolly  with my son and saw the tweets. No good. https://t.co/JogDk8ZVuX

@Wil_Anderson I finally got to see Billy a couple of years ago at the Hordern it was - surprising. He stopped the show & went on a primadonna rant about not being able to perform with sound of the air conditioner, threatened to have staff sacked over it. Recent diagnosis news excuses that.
@Wil_Anderson Yes incredibly sad to hear of his health.

@Wil_Anderson Maybe Parky has the problem, Billy and his wife have come out and slammed Parky, calling him a Daft Old Fart, and saying he doesn’t know what he is talking about. So has the production company that is currently filming with Billy and say he is as sharp and funny as ever.
@Wil_Anderson I Just heard Jimmy Barnes interviewed, no huge surprises but in his own words ... tears are flowing
@Wil_Anderson I heard about this. This morning & I’m kinda happy I missed it.  Thanks Wil for not sharing a link. Definitely agree he is #TheGreatest
@Wil_Anderson 💔💜
@Wil_Anderson My Dad has early Parkinson's. Saw Billy and unfortunately saw what the future will be ☹️

@Wil_Anderson His other friends are claiming Parkinson’s words are off the mark. And if his words are true why he would think its appropriate to speak about Billy Connelly’s (private) medical progress on a frickin’ cooking show?
@Wil_Anderson Such a beautiful history between those two. 2 very fine gentlemen;))
@Wil_Anderson So sad 😢 I didn’t realize how much he had deteriorated
@Wil_Anderson Link???
@Wil_Anderson Saw that too. Love Billy Connolly...funny, smart and kind.
@Wil_Anderson To see Parkinson's related dementia undermining such a beautiful gifted mind is so so sad.
@Wil_Anderson #TheGreatest yeah I decided that I really didn't need to see that - I chose to watch Mrs Brown again ♥️
@Wil_Anderson Immortal
@Wil_Anderson Such a brilliant funny mind, sad that it is failing him :(
@Wil_Anderson Fuck. Fuck fuck fuckety fuck. I didn't realise he'd deteriorated. I want to cry but I also want to listen to 'Football Violence' (or one of his classics) again.
@Wil_Anderson I am the same Will Bloody wife wanted to talk about it but....   so bloody sad. I am sure he would not like it either so there should be a pill to take
@Wil_Anderson It’s sad. I was tearing up at work when I read it. :(
